about: I am a dedicated Full-stack developer with a passion for crafting robust, scalable, and user-centric web and mobile applications. Proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, I specialize in creating seamless user experiences and efficient server-side solutions. My drive for innovation and commitment to continuous learning enable me to deliver high-quality projects that meet modern industry standards. I thrive in collaborative environments, bringing creativity and technical expertise to every challenge.

projects.title: Netflix - Movie Discovery Web App
projects.description: Developed a responsive web application for movie discovery, integrating the TMDB API for real-time content. Utilized React.js and Tailwind CSS to create an intuitive user interface with efficient state management via Context API.

projects.title: Moove Up - Fitness Tracking Mobile App
projects.description: Designed and developed a cross-platform mobile application using React Native and Expo to replace paper-based fitness training logs. Implemented features for real-time workout tracking, progress monitoring, and goal setting, delivering a user-friendly experience for fitness enthusiasts.
